column4: ok I need help. I must have gone wrong in the installation of beryl and now it starts on auto login then logs-user out, what is wrong or how can I stop it?
ok I need help. I must have gone wrong in the installation of beryl and now it starts on auto login then logs-user out, what is wrong or how can I stop it?
logon in safe mode .. and remove beryl from your session
how do I logon in safe mode?
